TopicTitle: I am flying to the temple right now and I want the exact location

Articles.Content: i am flying there at mach2.5 in a jet and i want a link to the exact location. Where can I find it. I am approaching the ocean after flying west. I want to land there and fly across the globe and make a stop there.

[KerbalMaps](http://www.kerbalmaps.com/)has everything you need. Just to go the top right and select "Anomalies." ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well, I am not the poster, but he tipped me on what to do today:

![30hyaaZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/30hyaaZ.png)

Thanks, I had a blast !

Now come on with your pictures ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T02:00:09Z" title="06/24/2015 02:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by Triop**

![screenshot88.png](http://s13.postimg.org/xjvpjgv1z/screenshot88.png)

I was inspired, so I took my favorite jet out to Sandoland to see the rock piles
Lol, keep those pictures coming please ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I highly recommend the Anomaly Surveyor contract pack, BTW.

![b12Ne7x.png](http://i.imgur.com/b12Ne7x.png)

> 
> [KerbalMaps](http://www.kerbalmaps.com/)has everything you need. Just to go the top right and select "Anomalies." ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks for this. Am I right in thinking that uses the same co-ordinate system as Waypoint Manager?

This thread inspired me to make a little trip out there myself... 

![screenshot17_zpsqilunyuw.png](http://i1184.photobucket.com/albums/z335/annallia92/screenshot17_zpsqilunyuw.png)

I claim these lands in the name of the Kraken!

![screenshot18_zps7k7b4lhs.png](http://i1184.photobucket.com/albums/z335/annallia92/screenshot18_zps7k7b4lhs.png)

I may as well join the party too then as I went there for the first time a couple of days ago...

![ME1YC8D.png](http://i.imgur.com/ME1YC8D.png)

I'll second the recommendation for "Anomaly Surveyor" contract pack. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
